title: What are some sources for discovering new product launches? - Quora

response.answer_text: Across the entire consumer packaged goods (CPG) industry (aka Fast Moving Consumer Goods, FMCG), there are two companies that have built (and continue to build) databases of all new product launches globally over the past 10-20 years.  (1)  Mintel's Global New Products Database. LINK:   Global New Products Database, Monitoring New Product Trends and Innovations  (2) Datamonitor's Product Launch Analytics database.  LINK:  Innovation Tracking

You might look into http://betali.st/ They have new products and services listed each day that are currently in beta testing.   You might also check out http://www.vator.tv.  They do not have a list of product launches, but they do have a large database of startups across many industries.
